title: 93/226/EEC: Commission Decision of 22 April 1993 amending the boundaries of the less-favoured areas in the Federal Republic of Germany within the meaning of Council Directive 75/268/EEC (Only the German text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 22 April 1993 amending the boundaries of the less-favoured areas in the Federal Republic of Germany within the meaning of Council Directive 75/268/EEC (Only the German text is authentic)
THE COMMISSION OF THE  EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The list of less-favoured areas in the Federal Republic of Germany given in the Annex to Directive 92/92/EEC is hereby amended in accordance with the Annex hereto.
This Decision is addressed to the Federal Republic of Germany.
